reviews.text:
El Parque De Sant Marti was a really nice park we took a stroll through as we were exploring this part of town.
On a roasting hot Friday afternoon we took a stroll through the park,it's well kept grounds are impressive, there's some nice bench seating,we chilled out here for about 20 minutes,soaked up the sun and checked on our phones places of interest to visit. 
We really enjoyed our fleeting visit to El Parque De Sant Marti and if your in the area it's most definitely well worth checking out.
